long_description: Our REI Rechargeable Travel Light offers light on the go, thanks to a compact, easily packable design and convenient charging via USB plug. 3 Super bright LEDs cast even, white light that's good for close-in use. Includes 3 rechargeable cell batteries; red blinking light indicates when light is charging via USB plug. Head rotates a full 180deg, letting you easily direct light where needed. Constructed of lightweight ABS plastic; includes removable book clip and notebook clip.
short_description: Our REI Rechargeable Travel Light offers light on the go, thanks to a compact, easily packable design and convenient charging via USB plug.
